orig_text:
IETF Network Slice:  The realization of the service in the provider's
   network achieved by partitioning network resources and by applying
   certain tools and techniques within the network (see Sections 4.1
   and 7).
correct_text:
IETF Network Slice:  The realization of the service in the provider's
   network achieved both by partitioning network resources and by 
   applying certain tools and techniques within the network
   (see Sections 4.1 and 7).
notes:
There is a confusion in the TEAS WG whether the "and" is to be interpreted as "both ..and" or "or".

See https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/msg/teas/xejJJtuNtCeCZniUEhQkadb1i3k/ for more context. 

The NEW text makes the intent explicit.
